K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:28a-0: byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag @28a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:28a-3: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mi 'khrugs pa des de ltar brtan pa'i brtson 'grus chen po yang dag bar blangs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba na da ltar yang bzhugs te 'tsho zhing gzhes la chos kyang ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:28a-4: sh'a radva ti'i bu; ngas mngon par shes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:28a-5: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na gang gis lag pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:28a-9: yan lag dang nying lag gang yang rung ba dag bslangs pa na ma byin pa gang yang med do; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:28a-10: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa des dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzung ste bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du nam yang klad pa na bar ma gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:28b-2: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i nad kyis thebs par ma gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:28b-4: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na ngo mtshar dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:28b-5: rmad du byung ba'i chos 'di yang byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:28b-7: yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na des tshe rabs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par byas shing thugs byung bar ma byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:28b-8: thams cad du yang tshangs par spyod pa spyad cing thams cad du yang 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:28b-9: mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i ming de nyid du gyur nas de sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:28b-10: gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag mngon sum du bzhugs pa de dang der skyes par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:28b-14: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po rgyal rigs spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:28b-15: khang bzang gi steng nas khang bzang gi steng du 'gro yang rkang mthil gyis sa chen po la 'gro bar mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:29a-0: de khang bzang mchog de dag gi steng du 'dug nas 'dod @29a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:29a-1: pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis rtse zhing dga' la dga' mgur spyod cing tshe zad par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:29a-3: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na yang des tshe rabs thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mnyes par byas shing thugs byung bar ma byas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:29a-4: thams cad du yang tshangs par spyod pa spyad cing thams cad du yang 'di lta ste; mi 'khrugs pa zhes bya ba'i ming de nyid du gyur nas de sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:29a-5: gang na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dag mngon sum du bzhugs pa de dang der skyes par gyur kyang rkang mthil gyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar mi byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:29a-6: de chos gang dang gang ston pa de thams cad kyang pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las brtsams te chos ston gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:29a-7: nyan thos kyi sa las brtsams te chos ston pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:29a-9: gal te nyan thos kyi sa las brtsams te chos ston na yang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:29a-10: de thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa nyid las brtsams te chos ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:29a-11: gal te rang sangs rgyas kyis las brtsams te chos ston na yang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:29b-0: de thams cad pha rol tu phyin pa @29b nyid las brtsams te chos ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:29b-1: des pha rol tu phyin pa las brtsams te chos bstan pas sems can rnams byang chub la btul cing btsud de rab tu bkod cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las brtsams nas de dag la yang dag par ston /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:29b-4: yang dag par rab tu dga' bar byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:29b-6: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha chen po de lta bu dang ldan par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:29b-7: de chos kyi sbyin pa de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:29b-8: kye ma dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te chos ston pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:29b-9: rigs kyi bu mo dag 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:29b-10: de dag thams cad sangs rgyas kyi mthus chos bstan pa 'di nyan par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:29b-14: kun chub par byed par 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:30a-1: cher yang dag par rab tu ston par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:30a-2: tshe rabs brjes nas kyang chos de dag mi brjed bar gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:30a-3: ji ltar bdag da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba bzhin du der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag kyang bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:30a-4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang dang gang du smon par gyur pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang de dag tu skye bar 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:30a-5: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mi 'bral bar gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:30a-6: gang dag dga' ldan gyi gnas su skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:30a-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srid pa tha ma pa rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:30a-13: dga' ldan gyi lha'i ris nas shi 'phos nas lus tha mas ma'i glo g-yas pa nas mngal du skye bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:30a-14: sh'a radva ti'i bu; gang gi tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srid pa tha ma ba dag skye ba nas chen po yang g-yo bar 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:30b-0: byang chub sems @30b dpa' sems dpa' chen po srid pa tha ma pa'i rnam pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:30b-7: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po srid pa tha ma pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:30b-8: ma'i mngal du zhugs pa na mi gtsang ba dri nga bas gos par mi 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:30b-9: der yid du mi 'thad pa'i dri dag kyang tshor bar mi 'gyur ro; ;byang chub sems dpa' mngal na 'dug pa na yang nam mkha' la gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:30b-13: rnal 'byor spyod pa'i dge slong rdzu 'phrul dang ldan pa ni; khang pa brtsegs pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:30b-14: khang pa brtsegs pa brgyud mar zhugs nas bar snang gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags shing spyod lam gyis gnas par byed kyang khang pa brtsegs pa de la reg pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:30b-16: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' srid pa tha ma pa ma'i mngal na gnas pa nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:30b-18: mi gtsang ba dri nga bas mi gos par gnas shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:30b-19: der yid la mi 'thad pa'i dri dag kyang tshor bar mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:31a-0: yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na 'di snyam du @31a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:31a-2: ji ltar bdag da ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bdud thams cad kyis glags mi rnyed par 'gyur ba de bzhin du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing der byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:31a-3: nyan thos kya theg pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:31a-4: rigs kyi bu mo gang dag byung ba de dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa nas nam bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon bar rdzogs par sangs rgyas kyi bar du bdud dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:31a-5: bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyis thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du glags mi rnyed par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:31a-6: ji srid du byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis yon tan phun sum tshogs pa de dag yongs su zin par ma gyur pa de srid du bdag kyang byang chub kyi phyir spyod par gyur cig snyam mo; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:31a-7: yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na chos ston pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:31a-8: chos nyan pa'i tshe lan 'ga' yang de'i lus la ngal ba'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:31a-9: sems ngal bar gyur pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:31b-1: 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa des dang po sems bskyed pa nas bzud ste byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na chos kyi sku rab tu bsgoms par gyur pa'i phyir ro; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:31b-2: yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod cid chos nyan pa na 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:31b-3: ji ltar bdag da ltar chos 'dod pa de bzhin du bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can rnams kyang chos mi 'dod par mi 'gyur zhing chos 'dod par gyur cig snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:31b-4: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs stong phrag brgya pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:31b-5: mi 'khrugs pa'i bkod pa yongs su brjod pa zhes bya ba ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:31b-7: /de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:32a-0: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag bar rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i @32a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:32a-1: spyad pa spyod pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:32a-2: legs par bka' stsal lags na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:32a-3: btsun pa bcom ldan 'das kyis da yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i da ltar gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa ma chis pa rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan du gsol /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:32a-4: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:32a-5: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:32a-6: rigs kyi bu mo dag gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i yon tan bkod pa thos nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar bgyi ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:32a-7: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la yang blta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:32a-11: mnyes par bgyi ba'i slad du 'dun pa skye bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:32a-12: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:32a-13: rigs kyi bu mo skyon ma mchis par ma zhugs pa dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i yon tan bkod pa thos na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:32b-0: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la blta ba @32b dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:32b-4: mnyes par bgyi ba'i slad du 'dun pa skye bar 'gyur ba'i slad du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:32b-5: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:32b-6: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:32b-11: khyod de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yod pa 'dri bar sems pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:32b-14: de'i phyir legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zungs shig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:32b-15: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yod pa bshad par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:32b-16: sh'a radva ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:32b-19: bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:32b-20: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:33a-0: de na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can thams cad kyis deng nas zhag bdun na @33a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:33a-1: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 'tshang rgya bar shes nas sems can de dag thams cad kha zas kyi 'du shes kun tu byung bar ma gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:33a-4: mal du nyal ba'i 'du shes ma byung /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:33a-5: lus dang sems ngal ba'i 'du shes ma byung gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:33a-6: gzhan du na sems can de dag thams cad bde ba'i 'du shes dang ldan par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:33a-8: mchog tu dga' ba'i 'du shes dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:33a-10: sems kyi nyams bde ba dang ldan par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:33a-13: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa' sbyad pa spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyis de dag thams cad kyis kyang de lta bu'i yon tan dag yongs su zin par gyur pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:33a-14: sh'a radva ti'i bu; gzhan yang de'i tshe 'jig rten gyi khams de na mi gang dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:33b-0: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis deng nas zhag bdun na bcom ldan @33b 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar shes nas de dag 'khrig pa spyod pa'i 'du shes kun tu ma byung bar 'gyur to;/
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:33b-3: de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyis gyur pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:33b-4: sh'a radva ti'i bu; yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes brnyes pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:33b-5: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:33b-6: sa chen po yang rnam par drug tu g-yos par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:34a-2: kun tu rab tu chem chem par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:34a-5: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:34a-6: rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes brnyes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su zin par gyur pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:34a-8: yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes brnyes pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:34a-9: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na lha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:34a-10: mi gang dag 'khod pa de dag thams cad byang chub kyi snying po ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar te phyag 'tshal zhing 'khod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:34b-0: de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par @34b rdzogs par sangs rgyas te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes brnyes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su zin par gyur pa yin no; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:34b-1: yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes brnyes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su zin par gyur pa gang yin pa dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:34b-3: yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na da ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su zin pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:34b-4: sangs rgyas brgya phrag mang po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:34b-5: sangs rgyas stong phrag mang po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:34b-6: sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag mang po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:34b-7: sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dag la yang med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:35a-0: de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyis gyur @35a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:35a-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:35a-4: smon lam gyi khyad par gyis 'grub ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:35a-6: ji ltar ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na smon lam ji ltar btab pa de ltar gyur pa bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:35a-8: yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes brnyes pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:35a-11: yud tsam de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na sems can gang dag lha'i mig dang ldan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:35a-12: lha'i mig dang mi ldan pa dag 'khod pa'i sems can de dag gi mig lam du snang bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:35a-14: de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyis gyur pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:35b-0: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de byang chub kyi @35b snying por gshegs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes brnyes pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:35b-1: bdud sdig can rnams 'di snyan du ci'i phyir bdag cag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa 'di bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i bar chad bya ba'i phyir pha rol gnon par bya snyam pa'i sems ma bskyed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:35b-3: de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyis gyur pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:35b-5: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes brnyes pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:36a-0: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i lha bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du ma steng gi par snang la 'khod nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs @36a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:36a-1: pa de la mchod par bya ba'i phyir lha'i me tog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:36a-12: lha'i rin po che'i rgyan dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa ga la ba de logs su gtor /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:36a-14: mngon par rab tu gtor te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:36a-15: mchod pa'i las la brtson par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:36a-16: gtor ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus lha'i me tog de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:36a-18: lha'i bdug pa de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:36a-19: lha'i me tog phreng de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:36a-21: lha'i phye ma de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:36a-22: lha'i sil snyan de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:36a-23: lha'i na bza' de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:36a-25: lha'i rgyal mtshan de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:36a-26: lha'i ba dan de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:36b-0: lha'i rin po che'i rgyan de dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i dbu'i gtsug gi drang thad kyi steng gi nam mkha' la rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa'i gdugs dpag tshad brgya'i @36b tshad tsam pa zhig tu gyur cing 'dug par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:36b-2: de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyis gyur pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:36b-4: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes brnyes pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:36b-5: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sku'i 'od dag gis nyi ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:36b-6: zla ba dag gi 'od zil gyis mnan nas mog mog por byas te mi mngon gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:36b-7: gzhan du na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:37a-0: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi @37a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:37a-3: lha thams cad kyi 'od dag kyang zil gyis mnan cing mog mog por byas nas mig lam du yang mi snang bar gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:37a-5: de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyis gyur pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:37a-6: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:37a-7: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:37a-9: kye ma bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad spyod pa ni ji tsam du go cha chen po bgos shing smon lam gyi khyad par rgya chen po de lta bu dag tu gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:37a-10: sngon byang chub sems dpa'i sbyad pa spyod pa na des srog chags brgya phrag mang po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:37a-11: srog chags stong phrag mang po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:37a-12: srog chags brgya stong phrag mang po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:37a-13: srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po dpag tu ma mchis /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:37b-0: brjod du ma mchis pa'i yang brjod du ma mchis pa gang dag @37b bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la rab tu bkod cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:37b-1: dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag bskyed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de dag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bgyi ba'i slad du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos nas ji lta ji ltar yongs su bsngos pa de lta de ltar smon lam yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:37b-3: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:37b-4: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:37b-8: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:37b-10: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de ni; sngon byang chub sems dpa'i sbyad pa spyod pa na go cha chen po bgos par gyur pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:37b-12: yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de byang chub kyi shing gang gi drung du bzhugs nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:38a-1: mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes brnyes par gyur pa'i byang chub kyi shing rin po che sna bdun las grub pa 'phang du ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:38a-10: dpag tshad bzhi khri yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:38a-11: byang chub kyi shing de'i yal ga dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:38a-13: yal ga phre'u dag rlung gis kun tu bskyod pa na de dag las snyan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:38a-15: chags par 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sgra skad dag 'byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:38a-17: ji ltar byang chub kyi shing de'i yal ga dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:38a-19: yal ga phre'u dag rlung gis kun tu bskyod pa na de dag las snyan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:38a-21: chags par 'gyur ba'i sgra skad byung ba de lta bu snyan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:38a-23: chags par 'gyur ba'i sgra skad dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:38a-24: lha'i sil snyan lan lag 'bum dang ldan pa dag rol mo'i slob dpon mkhas pas gsil ba dag las kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:38a-25: byang chub kyi shing de las pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:38a-29: byang chub kyi yan lag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:38a-30: lam gyi yan lag thams cad kyi sgra skad lha'i dbyangs las shin tu 'das pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:38b-0: @38b mnyen zhing yid du 'ong ba dag byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:38b-1: sems can gang dag gis sgra skad de dag thos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems rjes su dran pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:38b-3: yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su brjod pa dag legs par rab tu nyon la tshul bzhin du yid la zungs shig dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:38b-4: ngas khyod la bshad par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:38b-5: tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus bcom ldan 'das /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:38b-7: zhes gsol nas bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar nyan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:38b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:38b-9: sh'a radva ti'i bu; gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na ngan song gsum po dag med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:38b-15: der sems can gang dag skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:38b-16: dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39a-0: yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can rnams la 'di ltar rje bo'am bran gyi @39a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39a-1: bye brag tu dbye ba yang med de //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39a-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i mi rnams la bkol ba'i chos lhur len pa'i bsam pa yang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39a-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can rnams la bdag dang bdag gir yongs su 'dzin pa med pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39a-8: yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sa gzhi chen po thams cad lag mthil ltar mnyam pa ka tsa lin di ka ltar reg na bde zhing gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39a-9: lha'i nor bu rin po ches spras shing padma gser gyi kha dog can /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39a-10: 'dab ma bye ba phrag brgya stong dang ldan pa dag gis legs par brgyan la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39a-11: me tog mand'a ra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39a-12: mand'a ra ba chen po dag mngon par bkram pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39a-19: mi gtsang ba dor ba'i sa med pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39a-20: rdo ba dang ri med pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39a-22: sa gzhi chen po de la rkang pa bzhag na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39a-29: shing bal gyi sngas nang tshangs can gyi steng du mgo bzhag na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39a-32: spar zhes byed pa de bzhin du sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39a-33: sa gzhi chen po de la yang rkang pa bzhag na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39b-4: yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i mi rnams la rlung las gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39b-5: mkhris pa las gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39b-6: bad ka na las gyur pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39b-7: 'dus pa las gyur pa'i nang rnams thams cad kyi thams cad du med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39b-9: gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i mi rnams la kha dog ngan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39b-10: dri mi zhim pa dag thams cad kyi thams cad du med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39b-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i sems can de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39b-16: gti mug chung ba'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39b-18: gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can de dag la gsad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39b-20: go rar gzhug pa thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39b-22: yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mu stegs can gyi gnas dag thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39b-24: yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na shing ljon pa rnams rtag tu me tog chags shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39b-25: rtag tu 'bras bu chags pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:39b-27: yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi rnams kyi gos ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:40a-0: dpag bsam gyi shing las byung ba'i gos kha dog rnam pa lngas gos kyi bya ba byed @40a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:40a-1: de; gos de dag kyang mdog gsal zhing dri zhim po dang ldan la kha dog mi nyams pa sha stag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:40a-5: lha'i me tog rnams kyi dri bsung sna tshogs ci 'dra ba de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:40a-7: de dag gi gos kyi dri yang de 'dra la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:40a-8: dpag bsam gyi shing de la 'dug pa na de dag gi dri ci 'dra ba de bzhin du de dag gis yongs su spyad pa na yang dri de dang 'dra ba nyid du 'gyur bas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:40a-9: gos de dag gi dri dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:40a-10: kha dog la nyams par 'gyur ba yang med la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:40a-12: mi de dag gi gos rnams shin tu mang shing phal che ba'i phyir de dag yang dang yang du gos brje zhing brje zhing gyon par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:40a-14: yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi de dag kha zas ji lta bu dag 'dod pa de lta bu'i kha zas dag mdun du rin po che'i snod dag nas 'byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:40a-18: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams yin la ci bsam pa'i kha zas dag 'byung ba bzhin du sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:40a-19: 'jig rten gyi khams de na mi de dag kyang kha zas ji lta bu dag 'dod pa de lta bu'i kha zas dag mdun du rin po che'i snod dag nas 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:40a-21: yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi de dag gi kha zas gang yin pa'i kha zas de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:40b-0: @40b ros lha'i kha zas dag las mi thu'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:40b-2: yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi de dag la bshang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:40b-9: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams la bshang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:40b-12: snabs dag med pa de bzhin du sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:40b-13: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi de dag la yang bshang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:40b-18: yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyi khyad par dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:40b-19: mi de dag gi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu dag mngon par grub pa yod de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:40b-20: gang du mi de dag 'dug par bya ba'i gnas rin po che sna bdun las grub pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41a-0: khang pa brtsegs pa de dag gi nang na rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khri dag gi steng du shing bal can gyi stan legs par bting ba bkram pa dag byung bar gyur cing khang ba brtsegs pa de dag tu khang pa brtsegs pa'i yongs su spyad pa gang las mi rnams chu'i bya ba byed @41a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41a-1: ba'i rdzing rnam pa sna tshogs yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba 'byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41a-2: rdzing bu de dag kyang gser gyi bye ma bdal ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41a-3: lha'i shing mya ngan 'tshang gis bskor ba sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41a-4: de dag na mi rnams dam pa'i chos kyi dga' bas dga' bar byed cing gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41a-6: de na mi de dag gang du yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba'i rdzing dag 'byung bar 'dod pa de nyid du mi de dag gi drung du yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba'i rdzing dag 'byung zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41a-7: gal te rjes su 'brang bar 'dod na yang rjes su 'brang bar 'gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41a-8: gal te mi snang bar 'dod na yang mi snang bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41a-10: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na ha cang yang mi dro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41a-11: ha cang yang mi grang ba'i rlung dag ldang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41a-14: dal ba'i rlung dag kyang ldang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41a-16: yid du 'ong ba'i rlung dag kyang ldang ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41a-17: rlung de dag nyid kyis mi de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41a-18: lha de dag gi spos kyi bya ba byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41a-19: gal te la la zhig bdag la rlung ldang bar gyur cig ces rlung ldang bar 'dod na yang de la rlung ldang bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41a-20: gal te gzhan dag mi 'dod na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41b-0: de dag gi lus la rlung gis phog par mi 'gyur zhing gang dang gang gi tshe 'dod pa de dang de'i tshe de dag la @41b rlung ldang bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41b-2: de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41b-4: yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na da ltar nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gang bud med dag gi bud med kyi skyon du bya ba'i bud med dag gi bud med kyi skyon de dag med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41b-6: de dag kyang gang zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41b-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na bud med ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41b-8: mdog mi sdug pa; gzugs ma legs pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41b-11: 'dod pa'i longs spyod dag gis ngoms mi shes pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41b-16: ser sna'i chos kyis glags pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41b-18: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na bud med dag gi bud med kyi skyon ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41b-21: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med la ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41b-22: bud med dag gi bud med kyi skyon du bya ba de lta bu dag med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:41b-24: de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyis gyur pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:42a-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:42a-2: yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:42a-6: bud med rin po che ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:42a-7: mi'i bud med kyi yon tan dag las shin tu 'das shing lha mo'i yon tan dang ldan pa de bzhin du sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:42a-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na bud med rin po che'i yon tan gang yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:42a-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bud med kyi yon tan gang yin pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:42a-10: de dag gi yon tan gyi gan na bud med rin po che'i yon tan dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:42a-11: brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:42a-15: bye ba stong gi cha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:42a-16: bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:42a-17: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi cha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:42a-22: rgyur yang nye bar mi bzod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:42a-24: yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na skyes pa dag bud med dang lhan cig tu 'khrig pa spyad pa'i phyir lus sbyor ba med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:42a-26: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gang gi tshe skyes pa dag kun tu chags pa'i sems skyes pa na de song ste kun tu chags pa'i sems kyis bud med la yud tsam zhig bltas pa tsam gyis skyes pa de'i 'dod chags rab tu zhi par gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:42b-0: shin tu yid byung zhing spangs nas mi sdug pa la 'dod chags dang bral @42b ba'i ting nge 'dzin 'thob bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:42b-1: ting nge 'dzin des bdud kyi zhags pa las grol nas yang 'dod chags kyi sems skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:42b-2: skyes pa des gang la bltas pa'i bud med de bltas pa tsam gyis sprum mar gyur te gnyis ka'i 'dod chags zhi bar gyur nas mngal na gnas pa'i khye'u'am bu mo de'i lus dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:42b-3: sems kyis kyang 'di 'dra ba'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:42b-6: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams rin po che'i gzhal med khang na dga' zhing mchog tu dga' bar byed pa na lus dang sems kyis bde ba myong ba bzhin du sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:42b-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mngal na gnas pa'i khye'u dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:42b-8: bu mo dag kyang de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:42b-9: de na mngal na gnas pa de dag nyin zhag bdun gyi bar du bde ba myong nas btsa' bar 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:42b-10: bud med sbrum ma de'i lus dang sems kyis kyang 'di 'dra ba'i bde ba dag myong bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:42b-13: bsam gtan gnyis pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i dge slong thams cad kyi thams cad du bde bar gyur pa bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:42b-14: bud med de bu btsa' ba na yang mi gtsang ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:42b-15: dri mi zhim pa dag med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:43a-0: de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems @43a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:43a-1: dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:43a-2: kye ma nam bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing de yon tan de lta bu dag dang ldan par gyur cig ces smon lam btab pa'i khyad par gyis gyur pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:43a-4: yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pha dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gang gi tshe skyes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:43a-7: bu mo dag rgyan thogs par 'dod pa de'i tshe dpag bsam gyi shing dag 'dud cing 'dogs par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:43a-9: de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyis gyur pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:43a-10: de nas dge slong zhig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i bsngags pa brjod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:43a-11: bud med de dag gi yon tan thos nas de la kun du chags pa'i sems skyes te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:43a-13: bdag kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye ba yongs su 'dzin par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:43a-14: de skad ces gsol ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:43b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de la 'di skad ces @43b bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:43b-1: mi gti mug can khyod lta bu sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:43b-3: 'dod chags kun nas langs pa'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar mi nus kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:43b-5: gzhan du na dge ba'i spyod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:43b-8: yang dag pa'i spyod pas sems can rnams sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye ba yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:43b-10: gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de nyid chos kyi rgyal po bla na med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:43b-11: zhes bya bar shes pa ma gtogs pa rgyal po gzhan ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:43b-16: byang gi sgra mi snyan gyi mi rnams la rgyal po zhes bya ba gzhan med pa de bzhin du sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:43b-17: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de nyid chos kyi rgyal po bla na med pa'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:43b-18: zhes bya bar shes pa ma gtogs pa rgyal po gzhan ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:43b-19: 'ga' yang med do; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:43b-22: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:43b-23: lha'i dbang po brgya byin la rim gro bya ba'i phyir bdu'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:44a-1: rgyas kyi zhing de'i lha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:44a-2: mi rnams kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la blta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:44a-8: de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyis gyur pa yin no; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:44a-9: gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mi rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:44a-10: bag yod pa'i gnas pas gnas pa sha stag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:44a-14: 'di ltar kha lo sgyur ba de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de nyid kyis rgyu sngon du btang ba'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:44a-15: sh'a radva ti'i bu; de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyis gyur pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:44b-0: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs @44b pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten nam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:44b-1: de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dag la me tog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:44b-10: ba dan dag phul nas 'di skad du dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan par gyur cig ces smon lam btab pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:44b-11: de'i tshe de lta bur gyur pa yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:44b-13: de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyis gyur pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:44b-15: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na mi de dag la nyo tshong dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:44b-19: gzhan du na mi de dag shin tu bde ba dang ldan par gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:44b-21: gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de'i mi rnams 'dod pa'i dga' bas rtse ba'i phyir 'dod pa dang ldan pa'i dbyangs kyis glu mi len te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:44b-22: gzhan du na mi de dag chos kyi dga' ba nyams su myong bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:45a-1: ti'i bu; gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na gser gyi shing ta la'i phreng ba dag rlung gis kun tu bskyod pa na 'di ltar snyan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:45a-6: ji ltar gser gyi shing ta la'i phreng ba dag rlung gis kun du bskyod pa las snyan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:45a-9: chags par 'gyur ba'i sgra 'byung ba de lta bu'i snyan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:45a-13: lha'i sil snyan yan lag lnga dang ldan pa dag rol mo'i slob dpon mkhas pas gsil ba dag las kyang 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:45a-15: de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyis gyur pa yin no /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:45a-18: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su sgrub par 'dod pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:45b-0: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @45b sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dag yongs su gzung ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:45b-1: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyangs pa de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa dag yongs su gzung bar bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:45b-2: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:45b-3: sh'a radva ti'i bu; gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na nyi ma dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:45b-4: zla ba snang ba'i bya ba cher mi byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:45b-5: 'on kyang de na mun pa yang med la mun nag kyang med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:45b-9: 'di ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i 'od kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad rtag par kun du snang bar gyur pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:45b-13: nor bu rin po che zhig khang pa brtsegs pa'i ra ba'i sgo bcad pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:45b-16: sa bzang po'i zhal zhal gyis bskus pa'i nang du bcug la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:46a-0: der nor bu rin po che de'i rang gi lus kyi 'od kyis snang ba'i bya ba byed pa na de na sems can gang dag 'khod pa de dag gis nyin par yang @46a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:46a-2: mtshan mor yang snang bar shes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:46a-4: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i 'od kyis kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad rtag par kun tu snang bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:46a-6: de la khang pa brtsegs pa'i rab zhes bya ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:46a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba de'i tshig bla dvags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:46a-9: nor bu rin po che zhes bya ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:46a-10: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i tshig bla dvags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:46a-12: nor bu rin po che'i 'od ces bya ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:46a-13: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i 'od kyi tshig bla dvags so;; sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:46a-14: sems can zhes bya ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:46a-15: mi gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na gnas pa'i mi de rnams kyi tshig bla dvags yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:46b-0: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de ga las gar gshegs pa na sa chen po de la zhabs gang dang @46b gang du bzhag pa de dang de dag tu padma gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong yod pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:46b-2: de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyis gyur pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:46b-3: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:46b-4: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:46b-6: ci bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de khang pa'i nang du gshegs pa na yang de'i zhabs kyi 'og nas padma gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa dag 'byung lags sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:46b-7: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:46b-8: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dan ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:46b-10: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:46b-12: grong khyer dag tu gshegs pa nyung mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:46b-13: 'on kyang gang gi tshe gshegs shing bzhugs par gyur pa na khyim der padma gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa dag 'byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:47a-0: gal te der rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu @47a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:47a-1: mo la la zhig gis 'di snyam du gang de bzhin gshegs pa khyim 'dir gshegs pa'i zhabs 'og nas byung ba'i padma 'di dag thams cad gnas gcig tu 'dus par gyur cig snyam du bsam na yang 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag gnas gcig tu 'du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:47a-2: gal te yang 'di snyam du de dag nam mkha' la gnas par gyur cig snyam du bsam na yang 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus de dag nam mkha' la gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:47a-4: padma de dag kyang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de'i mi rnams kyi mchod rten du 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:47a-6: gzhan yang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de gang du chos ston pa'i phyir gshegs pa der yang padma de lta bu dag 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:47a-7: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa des phyogs gzhan dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:47a-8: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan gang dang gang dag tu sprul pa dag bkye ba de dang de dag tu yang 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus padma de lta bu dag 'byung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:47b-0: de ltar na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig @47b rten gyi khams de thams cad padma gser gyi mdog can 'dab ma stong dang ldan pa de lta bu sha stag gis rtag tu brgyan par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:47b-2: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'di ltar gser dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:47b-5: rin po che sna gsum las byas pa'i them skas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:47b-6: 'dzam bu'i gling nas btsugs na sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i ris kyi bar du phyin pa dag yod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:47b-8: gang gi tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la blta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:47b-10: bsnyen bkur bya bar 'dod pa'i tshe sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha'i ris nas rin po che'i them skas de dag las babs pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:47b-11: sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha de dag 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi de dag la 'di ltar smon pa'i sems skye ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:47b-12: bdag cag lha rnams kyi lha'i phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:47b-13: 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi rnams kyi mi'i phun sum tshogs pa gang yin pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:48a-0: bdag cag lha rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa dag las 'dzam bu gling ba'i mi rnams kyi phun sum tshogs pa 'di dag kyang khyad par cung zad tsam gyis kyang mi dman pa'i steng du @48a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:48a-1: 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa 'di chos 'chad cing bzhugs pas lhag par khyad par du 'phags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:48a-2: zhes de ltar sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi de dag la smon par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:48a-4: gang gi tshe 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi de dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi gnas su 'dzeg par gyur pa'i tshe na de dag sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams la smon pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:48a-7: lha 'di dag gi lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dag las bdag cag gi phun sum tshogs pa dag kyang mi dman pa'i steng du bdag cag gis 'dzam bu'i gling na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa chos ston cing bzhugs pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:48a-8: 'di ltar bdag cag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing phun sum tshogs pa des sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha 'di dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:48a-10: snyam du sems pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:48a-12: gzhan yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na lha rnams kyis kyang mi rnams mthong la mi rnams kyis kyang lha rnams mthong ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:48b-0: @48b 'di ltar yang 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi de dag 'dzam bu'i gling nyid na gnas bzhin du 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi gzhan med khang dag kyang mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:48b-4: da ltar 'dzam bu gling 'di'i mi rnams kyis skar ma'i gzugs rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:48b-6: zla ba dag mthong ba de bzhin du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:48b-8: sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing der 'dzam bu gling pa'i mi rnams kyis kyang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams kyi gzhal med khang dag mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:48b-10: de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyis gyur pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:48b-12: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad du chos ston pa na stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams der 'khor bzhi po dag gis mi stongs par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:49a-0: de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs @49a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:49a-1: pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par gyis gyur pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:49a-2: mi 'khrugs pa lung bstan pa theg pa chen po'i mdo las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:49a-5: sh'a radva ti'i bu; gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de chos ston pa na chos bstan pa re res kyang 'di ltar sems can dpag tu med cing grangs med pa dag dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir btul te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:49a-7: rnam grangs 'dis sems can dpag tu med cing grangs med pa dag dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mngon sum du bya ba'i phyir btul cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:49a-8: phal cher rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa sha stag go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:49a-10: yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:49a-16: rtsis mkhan chen po gang gis kyang grangs dang rtsis khyad phyin ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:49b-22: zhes bya bar grangs dang rtsis 'di dag gis bgrang ba dang brtsi bar nus shing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:49b-23: khong du chud par ngas yang dag par rjes su ma mthong ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:49b-25: gzhan du na nyan thos de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:49b-26: dpag tu med pa nyid dam; grangs med pa nyid kyi grangs su 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:49b-27: gzhan du na thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi ye shes kyis bgrang ba'i grangs su 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:49b-29: yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rigs kyi bu gang dag rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:49b-30: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:49b-31: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la gnas pa dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:49b-33: sh'a radva ti'i bu; 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:49b-35: ngas da ltar chos bstan pa na re ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun pa'i rgyun du zhugs pa'i le lo can gang gong ma'i khyad par mi thob pa de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50a-0: ngas re ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun par bstan pa de bzhin du de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa des @50a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50a-2: rigs kyi bu gang dag stan gcig la 'dug nas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu mi 'thob par chos bstan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50a-3: pos rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50a-4: chos bstan pa gnyis pas lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50a-5: chos bstan pa gsum pas phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu 'thob pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50a-6: chos bstan pa bzhi pas dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu 'thob pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50a-7: de la le lo can zhes bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50a-9: ji ltar da ltar gyi bzhin du de na gang rgyun du zhugs pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50a-10: re ltar thogs na srid pa lan bdun pa ma yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50a-12: lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50a-14: rgyun du zhugs pa zhes 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50a-16: ji ltar da ltar gyi bzhin du de na gang lan gcig phyir 'ong ba de 'jig rten 'dir lan gcig 'ongs nas sdug bsngal mthar byed pa ma yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50a-18: lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50a-20: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba zhes 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50a-22: ji ltar de ltar gyi bzhin du de na gang phyir mi 'ong ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50b-0: der lan gcig 'ongs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba @50b ma yin gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50b-2: lus de nyid kyis dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50b-3: 'di ltar phyir mi 'ong ba zhes 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50b-6: de na dgra bcom pa gang yin pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50b-9: gnyig med pa'i bar na yang mi gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50b-10: phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i dbyings su yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50b-12: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa des 'di ltar 'bras bu rnam par gzhag pa nye bar bzung ste dge sbyong gi 'bras bu ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50b-14: yang de ni rigs kyi bu'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50b-15: rigs kyi bu mo gang chos shes pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50b-16: slob pa'i sa la gnas shing nyams par mi 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50b-18: de la slob pa'i sa zhes bya ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50b-19: snyigs ma'i sa zhes bya ba'i tshig bla dvags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50b-20: sh'a radva ti'i bu de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50b-21: mi slob pa'i sa la brten nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' zhing mi slob pa'i sa la gnas nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50b-22: sh'a radva ti'i bu de la mi slob pa'i sa zhes bya ba de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:50b-23: dgra bcom pa nyid ces bya ba'i tshig bla dvags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:51a-0: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang @51a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:51a-1: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun rnam par dag pa'i snying po la gnas pa phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya'o; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:51a-2: de la rnam par dag pa'i snying po la gnas pa phun sum tshogs pa zhes bya ba ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:51a-3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i nyan thos dgra bcom pa zag pa zad pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:51a-5: dbang dang ldan par gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:51a-6: sems shin tu rnam par grol ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:51a-7: shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:51a-13: bdag gi don rjes su thob pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:51a-14: srid par kun tu sbyor ba yongs su zad pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:51a-15: yang dag pa'i shes pas sems shin tu rnam par grol ba /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:51a-16: sems kyi dbang thams cad kyi dam pa'i pha rol tu son pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:51a-17: phal cher rnam par thar pa brgyad la bsam gtan pa'i dge 'dun gyi tshig bla dvags yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:51a-19: de yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na nyan thos rnams kyi nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:51b-0: @51b yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na nyan thos rnams 'di snyam du de ring bdag cag gang du zan bza' bar bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:51b-1: de ring bdag cag la sus zan sbyin par 'gyur snyam du sems pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:51b-2: nyan thos de dag bsod snyoms kyi phyir khyim dag tu 'jug pa yang med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:51b-3: de dag gang gi tshe zas kyi dus la bab par gyur pa'i dus de nyid kyi tshe na lhung bzed du kha zas 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:51b-4: gang gi tshe nyan thos de dag gis 'di snyam du bdag cag la gzhan dag gis zas byin yang bla'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:51b-5: snyam du bsam pa de'i tshe na de dag la gzhan dag zas sbyin par yang 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:51b-6: de dag zas kham gnyis sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:51b-7: gsum tsam gyis zas kyi bya ba byed cing chog par yang 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:51b-8: nyan thos de dag lhung bzed dang chos gos tshol bar yang mi byed la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:51b-9: de dag chos gos dag mi 'dra /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:51b-12: mi 'tshed cing bdag kyang mi byed la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:51b-13: gzhan la yang mi 'chol mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:51b-14: gzhan du na spyod pa tsam du sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52a-0: yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de ji ltar da ltar nyan thos rnams la ltung ba bzhi po dag gi chos ston pa de ltar nyan @52a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52a-1: thos rnams la de ltung ba'i chos rnams mi ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52a-3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52a-4: nyan thos rnams la de lta bu'i chos mi ston to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52a-7: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na tshe'i snyigs ma med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52a-8: sems can gyi snyigs ma med /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52a-11: nyon mongs pa'i snyigs ma med cing snying stobs nyams pa med pas sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52a-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing snyigs ma dang bral ba yin pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52a-14: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de gang gi tshe nyan thos rnams la chos ston pa na dang po nyid nas yang dag phul gyi chos rnams ston par mdzad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52a-17: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na sems can rnams ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52a-18: mgo smos pas go ba sha stag ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52a-19: rnam par spros pas go ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52a-20: zhib tu bshad pas go bar bya dgos pa dag de na med pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52a-23: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la lhag pa'i nga rgyal can ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52b-0: de na lhag pa'i nga rgyal can zhes @52b bya ba'i ming tsam yang mi srid do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52b-2: de na nyan thos kyi dge 'dun la gang dag dge sbyong gi dri mar bya ba'i rnam pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52b-3: dge sbyong gi skyon du bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52b-4: dge sbyong gi gya gyur bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52b-5: dge sbyong gi g-yor bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52b-6: dge sbyong gi sgyur bya ba de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52b-7: thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52b-8: 'di ltar dge sbyong gi dri ma zhes bya ba'i ming tsam yang kun tu 'byung ba med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52b-12: dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin zhing dag pa yin pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52b-13: de dag la chos ji ltar bstan pa de bzhin du kun shes par 'gyur pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52b-15: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na mtshams med pa lnga po dag ston pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52b-16: thams cad kyi thams cad du med de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52b-17: de na mtshams med pa'i sgra yang mi 'byung ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52b-21: bkur sti lhur len pa ma yin zhing lhung bzed dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52b-22: chos gos lhur len pa yang ma yin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52b-24: thams cad kyi thams cad rnam pa thams cad kyi thams cad du chos gos dang yo byad lhur len pa ma yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52b-26: de dag la rnyed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:52b-27: bkur sti'i bsam pa las bzla ba'i phyir chos bstan par bya mi dgos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:53a-0: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra @53a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:53a-1: bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na nyan thos de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:53a-3: chog shes pa'i phyir ro; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:53a-4: yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de ji ltar nga da ltar nyan thos rnams la bslab pa 'cha' ba de ltar nyan thos rnams la bslab pa 'cha' bar mi mdzad do //
