K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:65a-2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing blta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:65a-4: ji ltar 'thab tu 'ong ba'i rgyal po de ltar ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:65a-5: sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:65a-6: rigs kyi bu mo rnams la bar chad byed pa'i las la gnas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:65a-7: mtho 'tsham pa la zhugs pa'i bdud rnams blta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:65a-9: ji ltar rgyal po mthu dang ldan zhing thul bar dka' ba de ltar ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:65a-11: bdud kyi ris kyi lha thams cad kyis mi thul ba'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa blta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:65a-15: bu lon pas 'jigs shing skrag pa'i mi ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:65a-16: gang du song na bu lon pa'am; bu lon pa'i mi dag gis mi tshugs par 'gyur ba'i mtha' 'khob kyi grong khyer du 'bros par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:65a-19: bu lon pa'i mi de rnams 'ong ba'i lam chad pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:65b-0: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa @65b dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa de dag la bdud sdig can dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:65b-1: bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams kyi lam chad pa yin no; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:65b-2: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na bdud sdig can dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:65b-3: bdud kyi ris kyi lha gang dag 'khod pa de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:65b-4: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag gang dag 'khod pa de dag la bar chad bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:65b-5: mtho 'tshams pa'i phyir zhugs pa ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bdud dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:65b-6: bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams bdud kyi las kyi phyir nye bar gnas pa med do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:65b-8: yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes bsam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:65b-10: skye bar 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:65b-11: brgya lam na yang 'jigs par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:66a-0: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i @66a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:66a-1: spyad pa spyod pa na ji ltar bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdud dang bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams par chad bya ba'i phyir nye bar gnas pa med pa de lta de lta dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngos pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:66a-4: zag pa zad pa'i dgra bcom pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:66a-5: bde ba thob cing mi 'jigs pa thob par gnas so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:66a-7: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:66a-9: skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang bde ba thob cing mi 'jigs pa thob par gnas te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:66a-13: spas pa yin par shes par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:66a-16: 'di ltar kha lo sgyur ba bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de nyid sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:66b-0: de bla med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas @66b kyi zhing der bdud dam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:66b-1: bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams bdud kyi las la nye bar mi gnas shing mtho 'tsham pa'i phyir 'jug pa med pa de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:66b-5: mi zhig gis dug sman zos te dug 'thungs na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:66b-6: des dug de kha zas kyi bya bar byas kyang gdug pa med cing legs par 'ju'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:66b-8: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpar gyur cing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:66b-9: ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing der bdud dam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:66b-10: bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams bdud kyi las la nye bar mi gnas shing mtho 'tsham pa'i phyir 'jug pa med pa de lta de ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngos pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:66b-12: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de de lta bu'i yon tan thams cad dang ldan pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:66b-13: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:66b-14: sangs rgyas kyi mthus bdag cag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:66b-15: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:66b-16: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:67a-1: tshogs dpag tu med cing grangs med pa de dag blta bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:67a-3: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu'i sems kyi yongs su rtogs pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad de /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:67a-4: ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par mdzad pas sangs rgyas kyi mthus tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus stan de nyid la 'dug bzhin du sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:67a-5: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:67a-6: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang bcas pa de mthong bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:67a-7: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:67a-9: khyod kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:67a-10: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:67a-11: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun de dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:67a-12: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dpag tu med cing grangs med pa de dag mthong ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:67b-0: bde bar gshegs @67b pa; mthong lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:67b-1: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:67b-3: khyod kyis 'di ltar lha de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:67b-4: mi de dag nye bar spyod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:67b-7: dga' bas bye brag gam tha dad du bya ba ci yang mthong ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:67b-8: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:67b-9: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:67b-11: bdag gis 'di ltar lha de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:67b-12: mi de dag nye bar spyod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:67b-15: dga' bas bye brag gam tha dad du bgyi ba ci yang ma mthong lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:67b-16: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:67b-18: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na nye bar spyod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:67b-19: yongs su spyod pa thams cad lha rdzas nyid lags pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:67b-20: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de yang phyogs bcu kun tu snang ba mdzad cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:67b-21: gser gyi mchod sdong ltar gzi brjid gsal zhing shis pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:67b-22: dpal 'bar la skyes bu chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis sku legs par brgyan cing dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus gzugs legs par spras la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:67b-23: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi dbus na chos ston cing bzhugs par gda' ba'i slad du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:68a-3: mi la la zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i nang du mchis pa na shar phyogs su zhugs shing ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:68a-4: ri yang mi mthong zhing lho phyogs su ma lags; nub phyogs su ma lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:68a-5: byang phyogs su zhugs shing ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:68a-6: ri yang mi mthong ba de bzhin du btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:68a-7: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi nang du mchis na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:68a-8: nyan thos kyi mtha' ma shar phyogs na mi gda'/
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:68a-9: nyan thos kyi mtha' ma lho phyogs na yang mi gda'/
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:68a-10: nub phyogs na yang mi gda'/
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:68a-11: byang phyogs na yang mi gda' lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:68a-13: yang de dag ji ltar snyoms par zhugs pa de ltar lus mi g-yo mi 'gul bar chos nyan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:68a-15: 'di na dgra bcom pa bsam gtan la snyoms par zhugs pa'i lus ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:68a-18: chos nyan pa na lus g-yo ba ma mchis te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:68a-21: ji ltar snyoms par zhugs pa de ltar mi g-yo mi 'gul bar chos nyan par bgyid pa lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:68b-1: rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar bgyi ba'i slad du stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste sbyin pa stsal cing yongs su btang la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:68b-2: yongs su btang bas gal te sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye ba lta na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:68b-4: legs par stsal cing legs par btang la legs par skyes pa lags te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:68b-5: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:68b-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der legs par ma chis pa lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:68b-7: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:68b-9: phyir mi ldog pa'i chos nyid rjes su thob par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:68b-10: bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:68b-12: de de bzhin te; ji skad smras pa de bzhin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:68b-16: rgyal po bka' khrims btsan po'i 'phar ma pa'i mi zhig rgyal po'i rgyas btab pa'i spring yig thogs te grong ngam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:68b-19: yul phyogs gang yang rung ba zhig tu song ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:68b-20: 'gro ba na de la la gcan pa rnams sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:69a-1: rung ste; sems can 'ga' yang de la 'gro ba'i bar chad mi byed cing mtho mi 'tsham ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:69a-2: de 'gro ba dang 'ong ba'i lam la gegs med pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:69a-4: 'di ltar de rgyal po'i rgyas btab pa'i phyir de 'gro ba la gegs med par 'gro bar blta'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:69a-6: de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas shi 'phos sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:69a-7: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas shi 'phos kyang rung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:69a-8: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:69a-10: skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog cing bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:69a-11: thams cad du yang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyes par byed par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:69a-12: thams cad du yang sangs rgyas kyi byang chub tshol bar 'gyur ba dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:69b-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:69b-10: de ci'i slad du zhe na /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:69b-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes sam; skye'am /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:69b-16: rang sangs rgyas kyis thams cad rgyun chad pa lags par blta ba dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:75a-0: @75a *// kun tu rab tu g-yo bar 'gyur /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:75a-9: 'og min gyi lha'i ris rnams kyi bar du grags par 'gyur te /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:75a-13: 'di ltar rang rang gi lha'i gzhal med khang rnams la mngon par mi dga' bar 'gyur ba de lta bu'i mngon par mi dga' ba'i 'du shes dag kyang skye bar 'gyur la tshig 'di skad du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:75a-14: kye ma bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa spyan du gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:75b-0: dbang du @75b gyur pa; tshad mar gyur pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:75b-1: snang bar gyur pa 'di shin tu myur bar 'jig rten du nub bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:75b-4: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po'i dus kyi tshe sangs rgyas kyi zhing de na rin po che'i shing ljon pa dang /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:76a-2: chos thams cad kun chub pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:76a-4: zhes chos kyi sgo'i gzhi brgya rtsa brgyad 'jog par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:76a-7: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na ji ltar de bzhugs pa de ltar yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis chos thams cad kun chub bar byed cing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:76a-8: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par ma gyur gyi bar du sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing du 'gro ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:76a-9: de bzhin gshegs pa la blta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:76a-11: shin tu yongs su bzung ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:76a-13: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang la la dag 'jig rten gyi khams 'di nas shi 'phos sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:76a-14: 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag nas shi 'phos kyang rung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:76a-15: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skyes sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:76a-17: skye bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:76b-0: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhugs pa de bzhin du de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na'ang chos thams cad kun @76b chub par byed pa 'thob par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:76b-2: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po'i dus kyi tshe 'di ltar sangs rgyas kyi mthus sems can gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na gnas pa'i sems can de dag gi mig lam du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de snang bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:76b-4: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen pos yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa na lha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:76b-5: mi rnams kyis sku la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir lha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:76b-16: rin po che'i rgyan dag gis sku la mngon par 'thor bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:76b-18: mi rnams kyi me tog dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:77a-0: rin po che'i rgyan de dag mngon par @77a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:77a-3: 'phang du dpag tshad gyi tshad tsam du 'gyur ro //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:90a-0: sems g-yeng ba med par 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du @90a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:90a-1: skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam chen po btab pas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:90a-3: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la las bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i mtshan thos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:90a-4: thos nas kyang yid la byed par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:90a-5: de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa'i sku glang po che'i khri la padma'i gdan la bzhugs pa'i bkod pa stong byed du bcug na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:90a-6: gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo de 'chi ba'i dus byed par gyur pa'i tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor zhing byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyi mdun du bdar te gshegs par 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:90a-7: des kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de mdun du bzhugs pa mthong bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:90a-8: mthong nas kyang sems dga' bar 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:90a-10: sems mi g-yeng par 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:90b-0: 'chi ba'i dus byas nas kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag @90b par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:90b-1: gang gi tshe rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de sbyin pa'i chos byed pa de na 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de mthong zhing mthong nas kyang sdig pa thams cad rnam par bsal nas sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:90b-3: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:90b-4: kye ma bdag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing der sems can gang dag skye bar 'dod pa de dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe bdag nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:90b-5: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis mdun gyis bltas pa dang bcas pa de dag gi mdun na 'dug par gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:90b-6: de dag gis bdag mthong nas sems dad par gyur te mi brjed cing sems mi g-yeng bas 'chi ba'i dus byas nas bdag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam de lta bu btab par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:91a-3: grong khyer kun dga' ra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:91a-4: skyed mos tshal med cing 'bab chu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:91a-9: glang po che dag kyang med la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:91a-13: gyo mo dag yod cing tsher ma stug pos gang ste bgrod par dka' ba zhig yod la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:91a-15: grong khyer de na rgyal po mthu che zhing dpung dang ldan pa zhig gnas par gyur kyang sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:91a-16: grong khyer gyi yon tan de dang bral bas mi mdzes te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:91a-18: 'di ltar rgyal po de mthu che zhing dpung dang ldan yang rung ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:91a-19: grong khyer de grong khyer gyi yon tan dag dang bral bas na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:91a-22: de la ji ltar rgyal po mthu che zhing dpung dang ldan par gyur pa de ltar ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:91a-24: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi rgyal po dpung dang ldan pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:91a-26: 'on kyang nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di na mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa gang yin pa de lta bu dag med pas mi mdzes so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:91b-0: gal te nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'dir yang sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa de lta bu @91b dag byung bar gyur na ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:91b-1: ji ltar da ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing mdzes pa bzhin du nga'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'di yang mdzes par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:91b-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su spyod par 'dod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:91b-5: yongs su 'dzin par 'dod pas ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyang pa spyod pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:91b-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa yongs su sbyangs shing yongs su bzung ba de ltar yongs su sbyang zhing de ltar yongs su gzung bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:91b-8: gzhan yang ngas da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sems can gang dag rgyun tu zhugs pa'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:91b-9: lan gcig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:91b-10: phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu la bkod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:91b-11: dgra bcom pa nyid la bkod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:91b-12: rang byang chub la bkod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:92a-0: nga'i nyan thos gang yin pa de dag gis kyang sems @92a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:92a-1: can gzhan gang dag btul ba'i nyan thos de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi gan na nyan thos kyi dge 'dun de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:92a-2: brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o; ;stong gi cha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:92a-5: bye ba stong gi cha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:92a-6: bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:92a-7: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi cha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:92a-17: ma yin no; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:92a-18: nga'i nyan thos rnams lta zhog gi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:92a-20: gang yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa'i nyan thos gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:92b-0: gang yang nyan thos de dag gis sems can gzhan dag 'dul bar 'gyur ba'i nyan thos de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus kyang de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs @92b pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:92b-4: bye ba stong gi cha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:92b-5: bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:92b-6: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi cha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:92b-13: sh'a radva ti'i bu; bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa des chos bshad pa lan re res sems can gang dag btul bar gyur ba de dag gi tshad kyang sus kyang gzung bar mi nus pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:92b-15: nga'i nyan thos rnams kyang lta zhog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:92b-16: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas byams pa'i nyan thos rnams lta yang zhog /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:92b-18: gang yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi bskal pa bzang po'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyi nyan thos gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:93a-0: gang yang nyan thos de dag gis nyan thos gzhan dag 'dul bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'i nyan thos de dag thams cad mngon par bsdus kyang de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs @93a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:93a-1: pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i nyan thos rnams kyi brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:93a-6: bye ba brgya stong gi cha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:93a-7: bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi cha dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:93a-15: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa des chos bshad pa lan re res sems can gang dag btul bar gyur pa de dag gi tshad kyang gzung bar mi nus pa'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:93a-18: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:93a-19: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:93a-21: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don bdag gis 'tshal ba ltar na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:93a-23: sangs rgyas kyi zhing de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:93a-24: so so'i skye bo'i zhing ma lags kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:93a-25: dgra bcom pa'i zhing lags par lta lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:93a-26: de ci'i phyir zhe na; btsun pa bcom ldan 'das /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:93a-27: de na zag pa zad pa'i dgra bcom pa dag mang ba'i slad du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:93a-28: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:93b-0: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a @93b radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:93b-4: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:93b-5: de na zag pa zad pa'i dgra bcom pa dag mang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:93b-7: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i skar ma'i gzugs rnams kyi tshad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:93b-9: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na sems can gang dag de bzhin gshegs pa de'i chos bshad pa lan re res dgra bcom pa thob par 'gyur ba de dag gi tshad ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:93b-13: 'dus pa chen po lan re re la yang sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag gis dgra bcom pa thob par 'gyur bar rig par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:93b-15: stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i skar ma'i gzugs rnams kyi tshad ni; gzung bar nus kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:93b-16: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing na 'dus pa chen po 'dus pa de dag gi 'dus pa chen po'i tshad ni; gzung bar mi nus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:94a-0: gzhan yang lha dang mi de rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa na brel ba med @94a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:94a-3: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams der skyes pa de dag kyang nyin mtshan du brel ba med par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:94a-5: gang dag yon tan brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:94a-6: thos nas kyang mos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:94a-10: kun chub par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:94a-11: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa de dag thams cad kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa mthong ba dang thos par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:94a-13: 'di ltar de dag yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan par 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:94a-14: thos nas kyang thos ma thag tu dad pa chen po thob par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:94a-16: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:94b-0: phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis @94b gsungs so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:94b-4: de la sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag 'khod pa de dag kyang yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'dzin par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:94b-7: kun chub par byed par 'gyur zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:94b-8: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:94b-10: 'jig rten gyi khams de dag na phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba rnams ma gtogs pa gang dag de las gzhan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:94b-11: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:94b-12: phal cher smon lam gyi dbang gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes sam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:94b-14: skye bar 'gyur ba yin no; ;sh'a radva ti'i bu /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:94b-16: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:95a-1: mngon par dga' ba na bzhugs shing phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:95a-2: nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'i gang zag rnams la phan 'dogs par gyur pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:95a-6: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:95a-7: rin po che sna bdun po dag byung bar gyur pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:95a-8: de rin po che sna bdun po de dag gis gling chen po bzhi kun tu gnon par byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:95a-10: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de yang yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dis phyogs bcu kun gyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag kun tu gnon cing rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yang kun tu gnon par mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:95a-12: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la dgra bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:95b-1: kun chub par byed pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:95b-2: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:95b-3: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam yang 'debs pa de dag 'chi ba'i mthar thug gi bar du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa des rtag tu dgongs par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:95b-6: de dag la bdud sdig can gyis glags rnyed par mi 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:95b-7: bdud kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i sems can rnams kyis de dag gi smon lam bzlog par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:95b-9: de bzhin gshegs pas dgongs pa'i rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:95b-10: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:95b-11: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye ba las phyir ldog pa'i 'jigs pa med par shes par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:95b-12: gzhan yang rigs kyi bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:95b-13: rigs kyi bu mo de dag gi lus la gang dag de las gzhan pa srog gi bar chad byed pa la brtson pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:95b-14: gang dag srog gi bar chad du 'gyur ba 'di lta ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:95b-18: mtshon la sogs pa dag gis kyang phog par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:95b-19: de dag gi lus la gang dag de las gzhan pa lag pa'i reg pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:96a-0: dbyig pa la sogs pa dag @96a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:96a-1: gis kyang phog par mi 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:96a-2: de dag la mi dang mi ma yin pa'i 'jigs pa yang med par shes par bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:96a-7: spas pa yin par shes par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:96a-8: gang gi tshe de dag 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur pa de'i tshe na yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams mngon par dga' ba zhes bya ba der skye bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:96a-13: thag ring po na 'dug kyang 'dzam bu'i gling gi mi rnams la snang bar byed do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:96a-15: de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de yang thag ring po na bzhugs kyang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag na gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i rigs kyi bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:96a-16: rigs kyi bu mo dag la ye shes kyi snang ba mdzad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:96a-20: dge slong lha'i mig dang ldan pa ni /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:102b-9: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:102b-10: 'chal ba'i shes rab can rnams kyi lag na gnas par mi 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:102b-12: gzhan du na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:102b-13: mkhas pa shes rab zab mo dang ldan pa rnams kyi lag tu gnas par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:102b-15: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang dag gi lag tu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gnas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:102b-16: lus la gnas pa de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:103a-5: rin po che rin thang med pa rin che ba gang yang rung ba zhig rgya mtsho chen po'i nang nas khyer te 'ongs par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:103a-8: nor bu rin po che 'di dang po kho nar su'i lag tu 'ong bar 'gyur /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:103a-11: rin po che de ni dang po kho nar rgyal po'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:103a-13: rgyal po'i blon po chen po rnams kyi sug par mchi bar 'gyur lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:103a-15: sh'a radva ti'i bu; de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yang byang chub sems dpa'i lag tu gnas par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:103a-17: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyan cing thos nas kyang 'dzin par byed; 'chang bar byed /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:103a-19: kun chub par byed cing gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:103b-0: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la @103b yang dag pa nyid kyi rnal 'byor du sgrub par byed pa de dag ni phyir mi ldog pa nyid du 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:103b-1: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:103b-2: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:103b-5: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'tshal ba rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di yongs su gzung bar bgyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:103b-9: gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bgyi lags so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:103b-10: de ci'i slad du zhe na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:103b-12: 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la zhugs pa na phyir mi ldog pa'i chos nyid rjes su 'thob par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:103b-13: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:103b-14: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:103b-18: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:104a-0: rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas par 'dod pa rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i @104a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:104a-1: sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:104a-5: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:104a-8: 'khor los bsgyur ba'i rgyal po'i rin po che sna bdun po dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:104a-9: las kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:104a-11: de bzhin du ngas 'khor bzhi po rnams la yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bshad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:104a-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag gis yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:104a-13: nyan par 'gyur ba de dag thams cad kyang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de'i sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i smon lam gyi khyad par dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:104b-0: rang rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rnam @104b par smin pas thos shing nyan par 'gyur ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:104b-2: gang dag bskal pa bzang po 'di la sangs rgyas dgu brgya dgu bcu rtsa drug gang dag 'byung bar 'gyur ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad kyang dper na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:104b-3: ngas da ltar 'khor bzhi po dag la bshad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan pa bzhin du lhag chad med par 'khor bzhi po dag la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di 'chad cing rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:104b-6: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:105a-1: dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:105a-5: kun chub par bya ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:105a-6: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya bar mi rnyed par gyur la /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:105a-8: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag khyim na gnas nas mngon par byung ba de la gal te la la zhig gis 'di skad du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:105a-9: gal te rigs kyi bu khyod khyim gyi gnas na gnas shing btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du zhugs te spyod par byed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:105a-10: de ltar na ngas khyod la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sbyin par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:105a-13: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung ba de chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gus par bya ba'i phyir gal te chos kyi rnam grangs 'di mnyan pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:105a-18: gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par bya bar rnyed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:105a-19: khyim gyi gnas su song ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:105b-0: btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bzung zhing kun chub @105b par byas te yang phyir mngon par byung bar byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag khyim gyi gnas nas mngon par byung bar btsun mo'i 'khor gyi nang du song ba de la ltung ba med par ngas rjes su gnang ngo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:105b-3: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag de 'das pa na yang bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nub par mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:105b-7: thag ring por gyur pa gang zhig na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rab tu spyod par gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:105b-8: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po des der yang bgrod par bya zhing /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:105b-10: bcang bar bya; bklag par bya /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:106a-1: la la zhig gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gzung bar bya /

K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:106a-9: glegs bam du byas pa zhig lag na bsrel bar gyur na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:106a-10: des glegs bam de brnyas te phyir log nas bdag gis glegs bam bri bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:106a-11: gal te glegs bam bskur du mi ster na yang de nyid du bri bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:106a-13: gal te rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo de 'di skad du gal te rigs kyi bu khyod zan bcad de 'dri phod na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:106a-14: de lta na ngas khyod la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di sbyin par bya'o //

K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:109a-1: de nye bar zhi bar gyur cig ces yongs su bsngo na pa'i bden pa dang bden pa'i tshig des bdag cag la 'khor lo drag po lta bu'i ser ba 'bab pa 'di dag nye bar zhi bar gyur cig ces brjod pa tsam gyis na klu rnams kyi 'khor lo lta bu'i ser ba de dag nye bar zhi bar 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:109a-3: sems can de dag gi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:109a-6: gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo dag 'jigs pa'am /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:109a-9: gnod pa byung bar gyur pa na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:109a-10: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de rjes su dran par bya zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:109a-11: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na bden pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:109a-12: bden pa'i tshig gang gis dam bcas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:109a-13: tshig brjod pa gang yin pa'i dam bcas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:109a-14: tshig brjod pa de dag thams cad yongs su rdzogs par gyur cig /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:109a-16: tshig brjod pa de dag thams cad kyi pha rol tu son pa'i bden pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:109a-17: bden pa'i tshig des 'jigs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:109b-0: @109b gnod pa 'di dag nub par gyur cig ces brjod pa tsam gyis 'jigs pa de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:109b-2: yams kyi nad de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:109b-3: gnod pa de dag nub par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:109b-4: sh'a radva ti'i bu; sems can de dag gi sngon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pa ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:109b-6: de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:109b-7: bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:109b-9: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gcig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur gyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:109b-13: de lta lags pas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyi'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:109b-14: de skad ces gsol pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:109b-15: bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:110a-3: ji skad smras pa de bzhin te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:110a-4: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:110a-5: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:110a-7: ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyangs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:110a-8: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bzung ba de ltar gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyong ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:110a-9: de ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:110a-12: byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gi sangs rgyas pa nyid kyang mtshungs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:110b-0: @110b thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang mtshungs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:110b-4: sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su 'dzin par yang mtshungs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:110b-5: nyan thos kyi dge 'dun gyi 'dus pa yang mtshungs /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:110b-6: de dag gi rnam par grol ba yang mtshungs mod kyi /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:110b-7: gzhan du na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi yon tan bkod pa tha dad par 'gyur ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:110b-8: sengge'i khri tha dad pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:110b-9: padma'i dkyil 'khor tha dad pa 'ba' zhig tu 'gyur bar zad do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:110b-10: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:110b-11: tshangs ris kyi lha rnams shar phyogs su bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar pa btud de phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad du /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:111a-0: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pas gang 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan na bzhugs pa'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'dir bshad pa'i bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs @111a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:111a-2: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la phyag 'tshal lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:111a-4: zhes lan gsum du ched du brjod pa ched du brjod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:111a-5: de nas 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:111a-6: tshangs ris kyi lha de dag gis lha'i me tog manda ra ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:111a-7: mand'a ra ba chen po dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:111a-8: lha'i spos dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa la gtor /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:111a-10: mngon par rab tu gtor to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:111a-11: mngon par gtor ma thag tu sangs rgyas kyi mthus me tog de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:111a-12: spos de dag bcom ldan 'das kyi steng gi nam mkha' la me tog gi gdugs chen por gnas par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:111a-13: gzhan yang 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha rnams dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:111b-0: tshangs ris kyi lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi @111b 'khrugs pa ga la ba de logs su me tog dag gis gtor bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:111b-1: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:111b-2: bdag gis sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor bzhi po 'di dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:111b-3: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha 'di dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:111b-4: tshangs ris kyi lha 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de mthong bar 'gyur bar de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas la gsol ba gdab par bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:111b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi sems kyi yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas rdzu 'phrul gyis nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags te bar snang la skyil mo krung bcas te bzhugs par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:111b-7: sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'khor bzhi po de dag kyang steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas bar snang la 'khod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:111b-8: sangs rgyas kyi mthus 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:111b-9: tshangs ris kyi lha de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:111b-10: steng gi nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas bar snang la 'khod par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:112a-0: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe 'di lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad @112a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:112a-1: de; ji lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul mngon par 'du bya ba mngon par 'du mdzad pas 'khor bzhi po de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:112a-2: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:112a-3: lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:112a-4: tshangs ris kyi lha de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa nyan thos kyi dge 'dun dang bcas pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:112a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis yongs su bskor ba dang bcas pa de dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:112a-6: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der yang mthong bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:112a-7: mthong nas kyang de dag thams cad pus mo g-yas pa'i lha nga steng gi bar snang la btsugs te bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa de la phyag 'tshal bar gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:112a-8: de nas 'khor bzhi po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi mi rnams mthong ba dang 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:112b-1: dbyibs dang ldan pa 'di dag ci sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris nas sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la blta ba dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:112b-4: chos mnyan pa'i phyir lhag pa'i lha rnams yin nam /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:112b-5: 'on te 'di dag ma yin snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:112b-6: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:112b-9: dam pa'i chos nyan pa'i phyir mi'i cha lugs dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:112b-10: rtags 'dzin zhing bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i spyan snga na 'dug go /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:112b-11: de ci'i phyir zhe na; bdag gis sngon chad mi rnams la 'di lta bu'i mdzes pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:112b-13: skal pa bzang po phun sum tshogs pa dag lan 'ga' yang ma mthong ma thos pa'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:112b-15: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi rdzu 'phrul gyi cho 'phrul de dag slar bsdus so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:112b-16: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor bzhi po de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:112b-18: gzugs na spyod pa'i lha'i bu de dag the tshom dang bcas /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:112b-19: yid gnyis dang bcas par thugs su chud nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:113a-0: @113a *// koo shi ka; gang dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skyes pa'i mi de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:113a-1: lha'i nye bar spyod pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:113a-2: yongs su spyod pa dag dang ldan pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:113a-3: de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:113a-4: mi gang dag gis sangs rgyas kyang mthong la lha'i longs spyod dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:113a-5: nye bar spyod pa dang ldan pa'i mi de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:113a-6: lha'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:113a-8: gang dag 'jig rten gyi khams gzhan dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:113a-9: sangs rgyas kyi zhing gzhan dag nas shi 'phos nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar 'gyur ba'i mi de dag kyang 'dod par bya ba yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:113a-11: de nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bus lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces smras so //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:113a-13: gang khyod kyis bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sh'akya thub pa mthong zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:113b-0: bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa yang mthong bas @113b na; koo shi ka /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:113b-1: gal te de tsam gyis kyang khyod kyi lus kyis rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:113b-3: gang khyod sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ba'i rnyed pa de lta smos kyang ci dgos; de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin 'di snyam du sems te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:113b-4: gang dag gi rna lam du yon tan yongs su brjod pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di grag pa de dag kyang rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:113b-5: gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ba lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam mo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:113b-6: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to; ;koo shi ka /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:113b-7: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i gang zag gang dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar 'gyur ba de dag ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:113b-8: rnyed pa legs par rnyed pa yin no //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:113b-9: de ci'i phyir zhe na; koo shi ka /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:113b-11: 'di ltar phyir mi ldog pa nyid la gnas par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:113b-13: srog chags gang dag gis ji ltar sangs rgyas kyi zhing du skye bar sems bskyed na /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:113b-15: de ltar sems bskyed ma thag tu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i phyir mi ldog pa ji lta ba de ltar gzung bar bya'o //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:113b-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na dge slong lnga stong tsam ni /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:113b-17: len pa med par zag pa rnams las sems rnam par grol lo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:114a-0: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong @114a *//
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:114a-2: sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:114a-3: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge slong ma lnga stong gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:114a-4: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'i dge bsnyen brgyad stong gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:114a-5: byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa ba'i dge bsnyen ma khris kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab bo //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:114a-6: 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i bu stong phrag rab tu mang po dag gis kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam btab ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:114a-7: de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye zhing /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:114a-8: bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lung bstan to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:114a-9: gang dag de las gzhan pa'i sems can sangs rgyas kyi zhing der skye bar smon lam 'debs par 'gyur ba de dag kyang de nyid du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar lung ston par 'gyur te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:114a-10: lung bstan nas kyang de dag sangs rgyas kyi zhing de nyid du skye bar 'gyur ro //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:114b-0: gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das kyis chos @114b kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i mthu dang byin gyi rlabs kyis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di thams cad rnam pa drug tu g-yos te /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:114b-17: kun tu rab tu chem chem zhing 'jig rten du snang ba chen pos kyang khyab par gyur to //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:114b-18: bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas tshe dang ldan pa sh'a radva ti'i bu dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:114b-19: tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:114b-20: rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:114b-21: lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:114b-22: mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:114b-24: thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:114b-28: dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rang ste bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do //
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:114b-29: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:114b-30: mi 'khrugs pa'i bkod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:115a-0: @115a *// rgya gar gyi mkhan po dzi na mi tra dang /
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:115a-2: zhu chen gyi lo ts'a ba bandhe ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o ////
K08acip-k_lha_sa-036-001:115a-3: 'phags pa dkon mchog brtsegs pa chen po'i chos kyi rnam grangs le'u stong phrag brgya pa las /
